mapper.select: SELECT E.eventNo, E.eventTitle, E.eventContent, E.startDate, E.endDate, E.registerDate, E.participantLimit, E.noOfParticipants, M.userNo, M.userName AS writer FROM events E INNER JOIN members M WHERE E.userNo = M.userNo AND E.eventNo = #{eventNo}
SELECT noOfParticipants, participantLimit FROM events WHERE eventNo = #{eventNo}
SELECT eventNo FROM participant WHERE userNo = #{userNo}

SELECT P.eventNo, P.userNo, M.userName, PA.cityName, PA.districtName, PA.streetCode, PA.streetName, PA.detail, P.applyDate, P.cancelDate, P.participateDate FROM participant P INNER JOIN participant_address PA on P.eventNo = PA.eventNo and P.userNo = PA.userNo INNER JOIN members M on P.userNo = M.userNo WHERE P.eventNo = #{eventNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO participant (eventNo, userNo, applyDate, cancelDate, participateDate ) VALUES ( #{eventNo}, #{userNo}, NOW(), NULL, NOW() )

INSERT INTO participant_address (userNo, eventNo, cityName, districtName, streetCode, streetName, detail ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{eventNo}, #{cityName}, #{districtName}, #{streetCode}, #{streetName}, #{detail} )

INSERT INTO events (eventTitle, eventContent, registerDate, userNo, categoryCode, startDate, endDate, participantLimit, noOfParticipants ) VALUES ( #{eventTitle}, #{eventContent}, NOW(), #{userNo}, #{categoryCode}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{participantLimit}, #{participantLimit} )
INSERT INTO event_address (eventNo, cityName, districtName, streetCode, detail, streetName ) VALUES ( #{eventNo}, #{cityName}, #{districtName}, #{streetCode}, #{detail}, #{streetName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE event_address SET cityName = #{cityName}, districtName = #{districtName}, streetCode = #{streetCode}, streetName = #{streetName}, detail = #{detail} WHERE eventNo = #{eventNo}
UPDATE events SET noOfParticipants = noOfParticipants + 1 WHERE eventNo = #{eventNo} AND noOfParticipants < participantLimit
UPDATE events SET noOfParticipants = noOfParticipants - 1 WHERE eventNo = #{eventNo} AND noOfParticipants <= participantLimit
